Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Troy in 1978...
Earned first career win on 5/7/1979...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had first career hit on 4/18/1987, off Dan Coley (HAL)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1987, going 5-0, 1.76...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1988, off Dennis Thompson (PON)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1988, going 4-1, 1.77...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Troy in 1989...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1991, going 20-11, 2.69 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1992, winning 2 games with a 1.08 ERA...
